briefTitle: Effects of a Supervised Progressive Resistance Training With Breast Cancer Patients During Adjuvant Radiotherapy
officialTitle: Effects of a Supervised Progressive Resistance Training With Breast Cancer Patients During Adjuvant Radiotherapy - A Randomised Controlled Intervention Trial
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Fatigue measured by Fatigue Assessment Questionnaire (FAQ)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* histologically confirmed primary breast cancer, stage I-III, after lumpectomy or mastectomy, indication for adjuvant radiotherapy
* BMI: 18-40
* ability to understand and follow the study protocol

Exclusion Criteria:

* contraindication for exercise
* participation in the BEATE trial or another systematic resistance or relaxation training
